tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My husband and I are beyond thankful for Dr. Sunita. She is a wonderful, caring and kind doctor. She is a blessing from God and no words are enough to express our appreciation. She has played such an important role in our lives; she went above and beyond everything we ever would have expected and will forever remain grateful. Throughout our fertility journey there were times I felt emotionally drained, but doctor sunita always made me feel that giving up was not an option. Her kindness and compassion have been such a blessing! Dr. Sunita always kept us informed during the entire treatment process and often took the time to personally call us to check on us. *** ** **** ************** understanding and comforting. Words can‚Äôt express our gratefulness but our hearts can. Her Team members were also really helpful, attentive and supportive. They are kind, compassionate and truly care about their patients. Their professionalism shown has been wonderful. My husband and I are thankful for their role in helping us achieve our dream.  Priyanka at the front office was extremely helpful as well. She always greeted us with a smile and was very patient with all my phone calls and questions. No matter how busy she was, she always made time to help us out. 

If you‚Äôre looking for the absolute best care for IVF, I highly recommend Dr. Sunita. She is excellent in every way. She genuinely cares for every patient‚Äôs outcome and for each person‚Äôs well-being. She has done everything in her power to make sure that I would get the best outcome from my treatment. She is extremely knowledgeable in this field. She is so careful in assessing the entire woman‚Äôs health that She does not miss any details that may compromise the outcome. 
We can‚Äôt thank Dr. Sunita and her staff enough for their excellent service. Dr. Sunita and the rest of the staff are in our thoughts and prayers every day and we pray that God continues to bless them all. Thank you all for your support throughout our journey! Thank you Dr. Sunita, for this life changing experience. You made our dream a reality.

Thankyou so much for everything mam.

Lots of love, Respect & Gratitude,
Dishma/Tarun

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review: I conceived twins in my 1st round of IVF under the care or Dr Sunita Arora and her highly competent team at La Femme, Delhi. Infertility is a frustrating journey for every couple and walking into an IVF clinic can be a highly daunting experience. But after my first appointment with Dr Sunita l felt at ease which ensured my trust in her and her team‚Äôs abilities. The IVF regiment is tough, complicated and has to be followed meticulously. However Dr Sunita and her team of doctors are extremely patient and guide you through the process over and over again. They keep a check on your progress throughout and keep your anxieties at bay while continuously ensuring you believe the fact that you will get pregnant! There is an uplifting quality about Dr Sunita that hugely effects your faith in the medicine and your body doing the work. I am extremely thankful and lucky to have been introduced to Dr Sunita at the right time in my journey by my gynaecologist Dr Loveleena Nadir. I highly recommend couples struggling with infertility to take an appointment with Dr Sunita Arora and make your miracles come to life!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Hysteroscopy,Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Infertility,
review: She will come across as a friend you can trust and for us she became a friend, consultant and guide .. therefore her opinions formed the most valuable bedrock of our decision making through our tumultuous journey which ended in absolute bliss. All thanks to the wisdom, cool composure and unbounded positivity instilled by Dr Sunita Arora. she was there for us whenever we needed her , over phone , messaging or otherwise. I can proudly and responsibly recommend to you Dr Sunita Arora for all consultancy related to assisted pregnancyAjay

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Pregnancy and motherhood are the most beautiful and significantly life-altering events. But everyone is not so blessed to have natural pregnancy. And, as per our Indian culture it is most important to have a child in our life. We were also facing infertility issues since last 10 years. Then some of our close friend recommended to consult with Dr. Sunita Arora- Obstetrician, Gynecologist, Infertility Specialist (La Femme, Fortis Hospital). We were very fortunate to have Dr. Sunita & her team. As we found that they were the most caring & supportive during treatment. Also, we have a personal touch with Dr. Sunita during treatment which is most required in case of infertility, as the patient would be going through very stressful life. With the strong efforts from Dr. Sunita we are now blessed with baby boy. We feel like the luckiest people in the world. Wishing Dr. Sunita to solve many more difficult cases like ours. Thanks to Dr. Sunita from bottom of our heart.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been consulting Dr Sunita from over a year now. I started consulting her for infertility treatment and her approach, guidance and supportive treatment helped me conceive spontaneously!! She has been our rock‚Ä¶.her ever smiling face and personal touch to the treatment makes you believe that things will be alright‚Ä¶it is really difficult to find such an exceptional yet so humble professionals these days. I did tele consultation with her for a long time. She was so approachable on video/voice or watsapp call, ever ready to answer all our queries without any time restrictions. During covid lockdown she went out of the way to guide us to get USGs done safely‚Ä¶. We are glad that we had her by our side during our journey to parenthood‚Ä¶Me and my husband fall short of words to express our gratitude to her for being there for us and for her guidance and support !!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr Sunita was absolutely amazing from the moment I made a phone call from Australia. 
She guided me in every step throughout my journey  and encouraged me to message or call with any questions or worried about anything; it was very reassuring. 

Unlike other specialist she chooses to get you pregnant first time hand so would tell you to do the right tests based on your situation. Then guides you with the right treatment, so you aren‚Äôt wasting your time with her. 
I couldn‚Äôt rate her higher, so professional, informative and understanding.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Sunita Arora has made my dream come true moment in reality.in the very first meeting she told me don't take stress very soon u"ll be pregnant. In really real, in just first consultation and medication I conceived naturally. Throughout my pregnancy journey she was like an angel for all my queries and doubts. Even in lockdown she met me for my checkups. She even explained small small things like in which side u should sleep.
There was some complications in my pregnancy but under her guidance, confidence I never bothered about those complications. She is real concerned about her patients.
I believed only when she told me that am pregnant. I just followed what she told me and today am a mother of my baby boy. She is fantastic doctor but for me seriously she is an angel.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hi,
Being a PCOD patient, I had to suffer a bad miscarriage in 2015 and was undergoing treatment to conceive again since then but all was in vain. After wandering here and there, following multiple treatments, our lap remained empty and also O was facing many health issues. Then, I got to know about Dr. Sunita Arora through one of my relatives. In the very first meeting, she convinced us for IVF as per my medical history and she was so humble that we built a faith on her. Finally, with her sincere supervision to my case, her constant attention at every step and her all time availability led to a positive result. She and her team are so well spoken, so smart and sincere to their work that they made the whole procedure totally comfortable for me. Since the first day, doctor made me believe that I am in safe hands. Thanks a ton for completing us by fulfilling our dream of having a family.
Arpita and Ashish

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: No words can express how grateful I am to have Dr. Sunita arora and her amazing team care for me during my IVF journey. Everyone was so caring and detail oriented every step of the way. Dr. Sunita collaborates with the patient and the nursing\/lab team to provide efficient, timely results.Special thanks to Dr Sunita Arora for giving me hope and making my dreams come true. I am so glad I got referred to you and that you didn't give up on me. I would highly recommend dr arora for any friends and family wishing to start a family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have consulted many doctor regarding my gynea problem,but no positive result was found. At last with one doctor's reference I have reached to Dr Sunita Arora in April 2018, and with in three months treatment I have got positive result and I have conceive. I whould diffinataly refer Dr Sunita Arora to my freinds and relatives.

I would say few words about Dr Sunita Arora that though a maestro in her field yet such a down to earth doctor.. always reachable during entire pregnancy period. she is very humble and skillful She handled all critical situation with ease,professionally and empathetically..


Bottom line is exemplary and priceless!!!!

Thanks Dr Sunita Arora.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
We highly recommend Dr Sunita for IVF treatment ,*** **** ******* ********* ** *** ****** She knew precisely the issue we were facing and was able to guide us through this complicated process with ease. Under her treatment we always felt we were in good hands. She always listens patiently and will give you the right advice.   
Thanks to her and her team that we are blessed with twins.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Over the past 7-8 years, as a couple we were struggling hard to conceive. We had consulted many doctors but no one gave us hope.

When we met Dr Sunita Arora, she gave us a brief about all the steps that she was going to take like how we would proceed if something works and what she would do if things doesn't work. She had resolved each and every query that we had which were never answered by any doctor in last 7-8yrs.

She is extremely caring and really dedicated towards her patients. Her positive attitude and encouraging nature, keeps her patients very calm and thats make the entire journey look very easy. Even her team has helped us in resolving every query, arranging nurse and medicine, etc during the toughest time of the year - second wave of Covid.

I am highly thankful to Dr Sunita and her team for all their effective work, efforts, love and patience they have shown during the IVF treatment.

*** ** *** **** ***

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor have me enough time to discuss each and every aspect of my health problem and then explained me the implications of my current state, my reports, the effects of medication she prescribed. She even understood the challenge I told her I was facing with weight loss and she made it easier for me. She didn't just give me cold advice like many doctors do, she listened and modified it to suit my need as a human being. She also asked me questions and advised me on my future health and plans. It was a more than satisfactory experience! üòä

I was trying from last 5 yrs had multiple miscarriages due to molar pregnancies bt never convinced with the answer dt what went wrong all the times , Dr Sunita Arora was the one who actually satisfied us with the answers n gradually we started with the treatment n within 01 year now i am a mother of beautiful twin daughters and I give entire credit to Dr sunita and her team who were available and cooperative all the time even at the time of pandemic. She takes care of her patients like a daughter.
Lots of respect and warm regards to Sunita Mam.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,

review:
Dr. Sunita & her team are experts in IVF treatment.
We had a mind block for this treatment but Dr Sunita & her team made us feel comfortable; moved step by step & looked into even the most little details to ensure success.
I had had 5 failed IUIs and inexplicable infertlility so one can imagine the stress level we were in. With every step they took there was a rat of hope. She is frank to the point yet caring. She doesn't miss/ forget any detail of your case. Has a personal touch that way.

We were blessed with a baby girl in Jan 2020 due to her efforts. We wish her success in all her endeavours. May god bless her always.
